name: Will of Power
description:
Will of Power is a global 3D real-time war strategy mobile game.
At the end of the disaster, the surviving civilizations are scattered in various tribes, and each tribe has launched a desperate rush to the alien crystals that have been left in various places. Survive or been destroyed, fate is in your hand!

Game Features
- Global fighting, the world is your arena!
Players around the world compete in one server, one world, one map. Ally with your closest friends to defeat challengers from different countries!

- Converging mightiest elites, named your legend.
Group the strongest alliance in tribe, and direct the most strategic battles! Challenge the legendary trials and hunt for unknown monsters!

- Extraordinary 3D gameplay with ultimate combat.
Full 3D graphics, real-time battle with real-time calculation, victory and defeat hang in the balance right at this moment!

- Massive legendary heroes, manage your exclusive tribes
Upgrade technology and constructions, fill totems and stones with magic, guard your tribe with powerful monsters, the road of conquest starts here.

Contact Us
You can reach us on the following platforms.
1. Official FACEBOOK Page: https://www.facebook.com/Will-of-Power-392239174963229
2. Send an email to community@pwrd.com to contact us.
